response.overview: Infinitely Unresolved is a collaboration with performance artist and dancer Arien Wilkerson (TNMOT AZTRO). LoVid and Wilkerson exchanged short dance sequences and DMs that were edited into a dance on desktop collage composition. The video was shot entirely using Facebook and Instagram Live. Selfie reflections, dirty screens, social media emotions, gender, and race representation, are all scrambled by pushing the live "analog video" effects and filters of these social media interfaces to a breaking point. - EAI
response.title: Infinitely Unresolved
